name: No-Sugar Three Bean Salad
author: QUIRKYIQ
summary: This recipe was given to me by a vegan friend I had in college. It is the best bean salad I have ever tasted, and I love it because you can experiment with the ingredients and still have a mouth-watering side dish. I hope you like it!
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and rinsed
1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, drained and rinsed
1 (15 ounce) can green beans, drained and rinsed
directions: In a bowl, gently mix the garbanzo beans, kidney beans, green beans, green onions, and celery
In a separate bowl, whisk together the vinegar, oil, honey, mustard, garlic powder, black pepper, onion powder, and cayenne pepper
Pour dressing over the salad, and toss gently to coat
Cover, refrigerate at least 2 hours, and gently toss before serving
